summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing shipping charges and services provided on various dates in April and May 2004. It includes information about transportation charges, discounts, and specific shipments made by Epstein, indicating his frequent use of FedEx services during this period.
